entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
